menus.name: Spaghetti
menus.overview: The pasta products that are cooked after extrusion, at the end user, are typically extruded under low temperature and shear, where the extruder is used mainly to compound the ingredients and hold them together. For quick cook pasta products, which do not require significant cooking at the end user, are processed with higher shear and temperature in the extruder.

menus.name: Spaghettios Pizza

menus.name: Chocolate Pizza
menus.overview: Pizza is full of umami, which means “delicious” in Japanese. Just like the other types of taste, which are sweet, sour, salty, and bitter, umami is a rich and savory flavor that your taste buds taste and recognize.

menus.name: CHICKEN FINGER SANDWICH
menus.overview: A chicken sandwich is a sandwich that typically consists of boneless, skinless chicken breast or thigh served between slices of bread, on a bun, or on a roll. Variations on the "chicken sandwich" include the chicken burger, chicken on a bun, chickwich, hot chicken, or chicken salad sandwich.

menus.name: FINGERZ BOXED LUNCH
menus.overview: We offer a variety of sub, salad and dessert platters for all to enjoy. Our sub platters are made with premium meats and cheeses, piled high on a private recipe roll. Compliment any sub platter with a freshly made salad platter or decadent dessert platter of fresh-baked cookies and brownies.

menus.name: COOKIE AND BROWNIE
menus.overview: A chocolate chip cookie is a sweet baked treat that is recognized by its butter flavor and the inclusion of chocolate chips. Some variations can include nuts, oatmeal or raisins as well.

menus.name: Hot Dog
menus.overview: A hot dog (less commonly spelled hotdog) is a food consisting of a grilled or steamed sausage served in the slit of a partially sliced bun. The term hot dog can also refer to the sausage itself.

menus.name: Cheese Dog
menus.overview: Cheese Dog Bread Rolls are as fun to make as they are to eat! Golden, crunchy, and stuffed with hot dogs and cheese.

menus.name: Midway Monster
menus.overview: Monster Reserve gives you energy and summer feelings, all year long. The fan favorite flavor is juicy and authentic.

menus.name: Milkshake
menus.overview: ilkshake contains ice cream unlike milk smoothie. Traditionally, milkshake is served with a whipped cream as topping in a tall glass with a straw.

menus.name: Filet-O-Fish
menus.overview: The Filet-O-Fish is a fish sandwich (or burger) sold by the international fast food restaurant chain McDonald's

menus.name: McNuggets
menus.overview: The Chicken McNugget is a small piece of processed chicken meat that is fried in a golden batter and flash frozen, then shipped out and sold at McDonald's .

menus.name: Combo Meal
menus.overview: A combination meal, often referred as a combo-meal, is a type of meal that typically includes food items and a beverage. They are a common menu item at fast.
